help.description: Prints a general set of available commands.

connections.descriptions: Prints a list of connected users.

users.description: Prints a list of connected users.

kick.description: Kicks the specified user. Use the silent argument for silent kick messages.

ban.description: Bans the specified user. Use the silent argument for silent ban messages.
ban.examples:
@@@ban Joe
@@@ban Joe You were being bad!
@@@ban test silent

banned-users.description: Prints a list of all banned users.
